name: It will Fall
description:
**It will Fall** is a simple game where you need to keep the platform horizontal to prevent it from falling.

Unfortunately I didn't have much time so I only started working on the jam game on Sunday.

Still pretty happy with the result, given the time I had, although there is room for a lot of polish and improvement, like finding a way to "consume" the pieces with combos and make space on the platform and better rules to compute score etc...

**MANUAL**

* Press **SPACE BAR** to start

* Press **ARROW LEFT/RIGHT** to move pieces when they are falling down

* Press **ARROW DOWN** to accelerate falling (be careful with that!)

Each new piece being put on the platform increases your score.

The game ends if:

* The pieces cannot fall anymore because the platform is full

* The whole platform falls down

**TOOLS**

The game was created using [ceramic engine](https://github.com/ceramic-engine/ceramic) and the [Haxe](https://haxe.org) programming language.

The music was composed using Korg Gadget.
